comment:
* Base class for the print service recommendation services.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mHandler
variables.comment: Used to push onConnect and onDisconnect on the main thread

variables.name: SERVICE_INTERFACE
variables.comment:
* The {@link Intent} action that must be declared as handled by a service in its manifest for
     * the system to recognize it as a print service recommendation service.

variables.name: mCallbacks
variables.comment: Registered callbacks, only modified on main thread

methods.name: public final void updateRecommendations(@Nullable List<RecommendationInfo> recommendations)
methods.comment:
* Update the print service recommendations.
     *
     * @param recommendations The new set of recommendations

methods.name: public abstract void onConnected()
methods.comment: * Called when the client connects to the recommendation service.

methods.name: public abstract void onDisconnected()
methods.comment: * Called when the client disconnects from the recommendation service.

methodNames: public final void updateRecommendations(@Nullable List<RecommendationInfo> recommendations)
